drinks.name:
Gibson Exception
Dirty Martini
drinks.recipe:
75 ml Åre Bränneri Number 6 Dry Gin
15 ml Noilly Prat Dry Vermouth
5 ml olive brine
Olives

drinks.name:
Fräkne Tång
Gin Fizz
drinks.recipe:
60 ml Klocktornet Gin Fräkne Tång
40 ml freshly pressed lemon juice
30 ml simple syrup
Egg white

drinks.name:
ND Forest
Gin & Tonic
drinks.recipe:
50 ml Norrbottens Destilleri Forest Dry Gin
100 ml Ekobryggeriet Spruce Shoots Tonic
Dried orange slice
Juniper berries
Ice

Olives

Gibson Martini

Pearl onions

Lydén Navy
Negroni

25 ml Campari
2 big ice cubes
